thread.title: Nicholas Bianchi
thread.title_full: Premium Mortgage reviewed by Nicholas Bianchi

author: Nicholas Bianchi
title: Nicholas Bianchi
text: Working with Phillis and Rebecca was a pleasure they were very attentive to my needs during the mortgage process .Although there was a few bumps in the road in regards to your underwriters and what they felt was needed , If it wasn't for Phillis and Rebecca I may have switched to a new mortgage company. I would definitely refer people to premium mortgage in the future.
